mapper.insert: INSERT INTO log (logno, memberno, table_name, action, ldate, details, ip, is_success) VALUES (LOG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberno}, #{table_name}, #{action}, SYSDATE, #{details}, #{ip}, #{is_success})
mapper.select: SELECT logno, memberno, table_name, action, ldate, details, ip, is_success FROM log ORDER BY ldate DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM ( SELECT * FROM log WHERE 1=1
AND table_name LIKE '%' || #{table_name} || '%'
AND action LIKE '%' || #{action} || '%'
AND ip LIKE '%' || #{ip} || '%'
AND is_success LIKE '%' || #{is_success} || '%'
AND ldate >= TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND ldate <= TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY ldate DESC, logno DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end_num, jdbcType=INTEGER} ) WHERE rnum >= #{start_num, jdbcType=INTEGER}
